ListAccountFactoryBaselineItems.document: 控制台获取账号基线列表

POST / HTTP/1.1

ListDeployStepTasks.document: 通过基线identifier获取部署任务历史
ListDeployStepTasks.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: controlcenter.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ListDeployStepTasks
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Limit": 10,
    "Offset": 0,
    "Identifier": "TCC-AF_CAM_USER_PASSWORD_POLICY"
}
